title: Top hashtags used by U.S. Congress Democrats in 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total number of mentions for 10 number of Hashtags.
The maximum Total number of mentions 6961.0 is found at Hashtag #forthepeople and the minimum is found at #hr1 where Hashtag is 1683.0.
The difference of Total number of mentions between the highest and lowest Hashtag is 5278.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Hashtag in the x axis and Total number of mentions in the y axis.
The Total number of mentions is highest at Hashtag #forthepeople and lowest at Hashtag #hr1.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total number of mentions for 10 number of Hashtags.
The maximum Total number of mentions 6961.0 is found at Hashtag #forthepeople and the minimum is found at #hr1 where Hashtag is 1683.0.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Hashtag, and Total number of mentions in each Hashtag on the y axis.
The Total number of mentions is highest at Hashtag #forthepeople and lowest at Hashtag #hr1.
The second highest Total number of mentions is appeared to be the Hashtag #trumpshutdown.
The difference of Total number of mentions between the highest and lowest Hashtag is 5278.0.
Total number of mentions at Hashtag #forthepeople is 6961.0 , second place is #trumpshutdown at 3992.0, and thirdly is #protectourcare at 2810.0.
Hashtag #hr8, and #actonclimate have the same Total number of mentions.
The Hashtag #forthepeople has 2.54 times more Total number of mentions than average.
Summing up the values of all Hashtags, we get total 27456.0.
